title: New: Linzi Jai – Morose
body:
This debut single from **Linzi Jai** is a real statement of intent.

Uber cool yet also showcasing hints of serious chart worrying pop-potential, _Morose_ is playlist perfect and hopefully the start of much more to come. Having already clocked up 100k streams on Spotify, it’s safe to say that Linzi Jai has already made quite the impression.
